word:
If meat is discarded, if the taste is not educated in that direction, if a liking for fruits and grains is encouraged, it will soon be as God in the beginning designed it should be. No meat will be used by His people. 
     [ISRAEL BROUGHT BACK TO THE ORIGINAL DIET--644] 
     [GOD'S PURPOSE IN RESTRICTING ISRAEL'S DIET--641, 643, 644]
